*Install package (or 'crates' in Rust terms)*
{{{bash
cargo install <package>
}}}

*Build package (_debug_ build)*
{{{bash
cargo build
}}}

*Build & Run (_debug_ build)*
{{{bash
cargo run

# run with arguments:
cargo run -- <args>
}}}

*Build (_release optimized_)*
{{{bash
cargo build --release
}}}
